text: Anata gataga moshi minashigo ni taishi, kōsei ni shiteyare-sō ni mo nainaraba, anata gata ga yoi to omou 2-ri, 3-ri matawa 4-ri no on'na o fure. Daga kōhei ni shiteyare-sō ni mo nainaraba, tada 1-ri dake ( 嬰Ru ka), matawa anata gata no migite ga shoyū suru mono (dorei no on'na) de gaman shite oki nasai. Ko no koto wa fukōsei o yokeru tame, mottomo kōseidearu
